body:
Do you guys generally enjoy videos where there is one person commentating or when there is a group of 2 or more people talking to each other?
(this really only applies to gaming videos)
body_tagged:
Do you guys generally enjoy videos where there is one person commentating or when there is a group of 2 or more people talking to each other?
(this really only applies to gaming videos)
title: youtube question

replies.body: 2 or more, single person commentary is boring IMO, even though I do it. :/
replies.body_tagged: 2 or more, single person commentary is boring IMO, even though I do it. :/

replies.body: I think it's better when it's more then one person.
replies.body_tagged: I think it's better when it's more then one person.

replies.body: yea that is what i was expecting, my video when i have a friend usually get more views.
replies.body_tagged: yea that is what i was expecting, my video when i have a friend usually get more views.

replies.body: I like it more when there are groups.
replies.body_tagged: I like it more when there are groups.
